subject: AI & Agents
title: What Is a Prompt?
description: A 60-second lesson on What Is a Prompt?.

hook.text: The difference between a useless AI response and a brilliant one is often just how you asked.

buildup.text: A prompt is the text input you give to an LLM â€” your question, instruction, or context.

discovery.text: Good prompts are specific, provide context, and state the desired format clearly.

twist.text: Adding 'think step by step' to a prompt can dramatically improve reasoning accuracy.

climax.text: Prompt engineering is now a real skill. Companies hire specialists to craft optimal prompts.

punchline.text: The art of AI isn't in the model. It's in the question.

quiz.question: What makes a prompt effective?
options: Being specific, providing context, and stating the desired format
